data.name: Alice's Jigsaw. Wonderland Chronicles 2
data.detailed_description:
Alice is known the world over from her beloved fairytale, filled with magic, iconic characters and whimsical story elements.

Alice's Jigsaw. Wonderland Chronicles 2 features 120 mosaic brain teasers that differ in both speed and length. The pictures are made from high-quality photographs all with specially-picked themes showing the magical world of Alice in a more modern style, including fantastic images, tea parties, white rabbits, pocket and grandfather clocks, card/chess themes and much more.

Solve puzzles and beat levels in 6 different exciting worlds. Alice's Jigsaw. Wonderland Chronicles 2 is an entertaining mosaic brain teaser game for the whole family.

- 120 unique puzzles
- 6 unique locations.
- Characters from your childhood.
- A magical fairytale setting.
- Special quests and 18 trophies for the real pros
- More than 10 hours of gameplay with beautiful calming and cheerful music
- Entertaining gameplay for players of all ages
- Use bonuses and earn new ranks
- Get the max number of keys on each level and unlock new worlds!

data.short_description: See Alice and her friends! Solve 120 unique patchwork mosaics!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 x64
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11.6
  • Processor: CPU: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
